gurmukhi: siqgur drsn sbd AgwiD boD Aibgiq giq nyq nyq nmo nmo hY
transliteration: Satigur Darasan Sabad Agaadhi Bodha , Abigati Gati Nayt Nayt Namo Namo Hai ?
translation: Understanding the deep philosophy and his precept is highly unfathomable matter that is beyond comprehension. Like the imperishable Lord, it is beyond and infinite and worthy of salutation time and again.

gurmukhi: drs iDAwn Aru sbd igAwn ilv gupq pRgt Tt pUrn bHm hY
transliteration: Daras Dhiaan Aru Sabad Giaan Liva , Goupat Pragat Tthat Pooran Braham Hai ?
translation: By concentrating mind in his philosophy and attaching the mind in Naam Simran, one realises the omnipresent Lord in the entire expanse created by Him.

gurmukhi: inrgun srgun kusmwvlI sugMiD eyk Aau Anyk rUp gimqw Agm hY
transliteration: Niragoun Saragoun Kousamaavalee Sougandhi , Ayk Au Anayk Roop Gamitaa Agam Hai ?
translation: One Transcendental Lord is appearing in countless immanent forms. Like the fragrance of a flower bed, He, the inaccessible can be realised and felt.

gurmukhi: prmdBuq AcrjY Ascrj mY AkQ kQw AlK ibsmY ibsm hY ]81]
transliteration: Paramadabhout Acharajai Asacharaj Mai , Akad Kadaa Alakh Bisamai Bisam Hai ?81?
translation: The precept and philosophy of the True Guru is utmost admirable. It is most astonishing and beyond description. He is beyond understanding and stranger than the strangest. (81)
